segments.text: The little girl looks so hopeful, waiting for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, and she’s watching the boy so intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, just wanting a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him to get the cookies safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels like a sweet but risky moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught by their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s smile is so genuine, it’s hard to be mad at her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be so happy when she gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
